channel.title: Skills?
channel.description: how to change what level your skills are when you login? Like herb is 1 i wana change it to 99.

item.title: Skills?
item.dc:creator: @The_cook_from_runesc The cook from runescape
item.description:
@The_cook_from_runesc wrote:

[quote=“Sp3c u k0, post:5, topic:282324”]If Your Using 317… Going into teh characters file and say your name on There is A

Look through the files and find A.
Click on it and scroll down till it says

CharactersSkill=15 1 0

Or something change the 1 to 99 and the 0 to how much xp you need/want.[/quote]He wanted to change the default…

I got an idea, just search the hitpoints XP you start with (because it’s not zero) and the other levels should be around it.

Read full topic

item.title: Skills?
item.dc:creator: @Sp3c_u_k0 Sp3c u k0
item.description:
@Sp3c_u_k0 wrote:

If Your Using 317… Going into teh characters file and say your name on There is A

Look through the files and find A.
Click on it and scroll down till it says

CharactersSkill=15 1 0

Or something change the 1 to 99 and the 0 to how much xp you need/want.

Read full topic

item.title: Skills?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“lil wayne612, post:3, topic:282324”]public int playerHerblore = 15;

i found that[/quote]

Nope that’s not it, that just means Herblore is the 15th skill. So search for playerLevel[15] and change that to 99.

Read full topic
